BRANDING.TITLE: Branding
BRANDING.DESCRIPTION: Configure your brand name, website, support email, and upload logos and favicons.
BRANDING.SUPPORT_EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
BRANDING.LOGO_MAIN_HELP: Upload your main logo (PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF, or WebP, max 2MB). This will be used in the header and sidebar.
BRANDING.LOGO_COMPACT_HELP: Upload a compact version of your logo (PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF, or WebP, max 2MB). This will be used in smaller spaces.
BRANDING.FAVICON_HELP: Upload your favicon (PNG, ICO, or SVG, max 1MB). This appears in browser tabs.
BRANDING.APPLE_TOUCH_ICON_HELP: Upload an Apple Touch Icon (PNG or JPG, max 1MB). This is used when users add your site to their iOS home screen.
